data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of San José.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of San José, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 7,908 believers in San José to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Father, convict the 7,908 believers in San José to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in San José, Uruguay. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ecilda Paullier
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ecilda Paullier, San José, Uruguay.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of San José.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in San José, Uruguay.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in San José, Uruguay to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

location.name: San José
location.cities_list: San José de Mayo, Libertad, Rodríguez, Ecilda Paullier, Puntas de Valdéz
location.cities_list_w_pop: San José de Mayo (36,529), Libertad (10,166), Rodríguez (2,604), Ecilda Paullier (2,395), Puntas de Valdéz (1,491)
